output: For each type 2 operation, prithe number of elements that need to be changed.
input: The first line contains two integers N and Q (1 ≤ N, Q ≤ 105), which represents how many elements the array has and how many queries Dabriel will perform. The second line contains N integers Xi (1 ≤ Xi ≤ 105) which indicates the value of the ith position of the initial array. In the next Q lines will contain the queries, which can be: 1 X W (1 ≤ X ≤ N, 1 ≤ W ≤ 105), indicating the change operation and 2 X Y W (1 ≤ X ≤ Y ≤ N, 1 ≤ W ≤ 105), indicating the query operation.
name: Playing with Queries
